title: ersatz
text:
Library behind the paper: “Scaling Ersatz User Interactions via Foundation Models for Training AI Agents”
Supports the following Ersatz Interactions: * QA of Documents and Websites * Chat with a bot * Using tools * Performing actions in an environment (e.g. website, mobile phone, PC, etc)
Supports the following modalities: * Text * Images * Videos * Audio
